about_the_game:
Free Range Games are proud to present the official soundtrack to The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria!

Dwarves are well-known for their love of song, from folksy work shanties, to boisterous drinking tunes and ancient veneration songs. Songs are an important part of J.R.R. Tolkien’s work and they come to life in Return to Moria.

This Original Soundtrack includes:
  • The sweeping score that accompanies Gimli’s call to arms, as well as all the gameplay and cinematics.
  • Call-and-response Mining songs inspired by traditional work songs and shanties, as sung by the Dwarves during gameplay.
  • Rollicking tavern songs, best sung with a tankard of ale in the hand.
  • Moving choral songs that venerate key moments in the game, including the famous Song of Gimli from The Fellowship of the Ring.
  • Nine songs written by Professor Tolkien, straight from the books.
  • Fourteen original songs inspired by the events of the game and the lives of Dwarves in the Fourth Age.
  • The vocal talent of incredible singers who have sung for the San Francisco Opera and the San Francisco Symphony.
  • And more!

Including 34 total tracks of original music.

Written by

J.R.R. Tolkien, Max Lescohier, Teddy Edelston

Composed by

Max Lescohier, Teddy Edelston and Jason Butler

Produced and mixed by

Scott McDowell

Sung by:

  • Matt Peterson, Bass
  • Clayton Moser, Bass
  • Kevin Gino, Tenor
  • Sam Faustine, Tenor
  • Meghan Spyker, Alto
  • Hilary Jenson, Alto
  • Morgan Balfour, Soprano
  • Caitlin Austin, Soprano

Once installed, the files will default to be placed into your Steam folder. For most users that will be \Steam\steamapps\music\The Lord of the Rings Return to Moria Soundtrack. This is also where any high definition audio files will be placed!
detailed_description:
Free Range Games are proud to present the official soundtrack to The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria!

Dwarves are well-known for their love of song, from folksy work shanties, to boisterous drinking tunes and ancient veneration songs. Songs are an important part of J.R.R. Tolkien’s work and they come to life in Return to Moria.

This Original Soundtrack includes:
  • The sweeping score that accompanies Gimli’s call to arms, as well as all the gameplay and cinematics.
  • Call-and-response Mining songs inspired by traditional work songs and shanties, as sung by the Dwarves during gameplay.
  • Rollicking tavern songs, best sung with a tankard of ale in the hand.
  • Moving choral songs that venerate key moments in the game, including the famous Song of Gimli from The Fellowship of the Ring.
  • Nine songs written by Professor Tolkien, straight from the books.
  • Fourteen original songs inspired by the events of the game and the lives of Dwarves in the Fourth Age.
  • The vocal talent of incredible singers who have sung for the San Francisco Opera and the San Francisco Symphony.
  • And more!

Including 34 total tracks of original music.

Written by

J.R.R. Tolkien, Max Lescohier, Teddy Edelston

Composed by

Max Lescohier, Teddy Edelston and Jason Butler

Produced and mixed by

Scott McDowell

Sung by:

  • Matt Peterson, Bass
  • Clayton Moser, Bass
  • Kevin Gino, Tenor
  • Sam Faustine, Tenor
  • Meghan Spyker, Alto
  • Hilary Jenson, Alto
  • Morgan Balfour, Soprano
  • Caitlin Austin, Soprano

Once installed, the files will default to be placed into your Steam folder. For most users that will be \Steam\steamapps\music\The Lord of the Rings Return to Moria Soundtrack. This is also where any high definition audio files will be placed!
